resources.string: Randomizing your character will cause changes you have made to be lost. Are you sure you want to randomize your character?

<font color="#ffffff">Are you sure you want to delete {characterName}?

This cannot be undone. You will lose all items and progress made on this character.

Once deleted, you have <font color={highlightColor}>7 days</font> to contact customer service to restore your character.</font>
<font color="#cccccc" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font">(You will retain your purchased items.)</font>

You can only have 1 character in a World Set.
You can only have {characterLimit} character(s) in this World.
You currently cannot equip this item. Continue?
Claim a protection ward to control land for your Company.\nYou can only build structures on claimed land.

There's always power in numbers.
Press <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> G </font></font> to open the Company menu where you can accept or send Company invites.

You cannot damage other players in your Company.

Press <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> Enter </font></font> to type in chat.\n\nHold <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> V </font></font> for Voice Chat.
Equip weapons and tools on your Quickbar.\nYou can equip food and potions on your Quickbar.
Swords and Axes have a special attack when you press <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> Q </font></font>.
Hold the <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> Right Mouse Button </font></font> to block.
Press <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> Middle Mouse Button </font></font> to Lock On to targets.
If you want to break an opponent’s guard, press <font color="#fff1ce"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font"> F </font></font> for a break attack.
You can place a structure plan on Claims.\nTo complete a structure plan, add resources as you find them.
Enter chat message. @mention a recent chatter

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold_Italic.font">Checkpoint {checkpoint}:</font> {currentProgression}/{maxProgression}\n\nProgress your track by engaging in PvP Missions, War, Outpost Rush, Capturing Forts, Defeating other players and 3v3 Arenas.

You must complete all the checkpoints before starting the next track. If you choose a reward from each checkpoint, you will automatically start the next track.\n\nFor every checkpoint that you forgo choosing a reward, you’ll be granted 300 Azoth Salt when the next track starts.
Reward options will be revealed after completing the checkpoint.

string.comment: The number of times they have completed the track. Like a level

resources.string: Choose up to 1 item per checkpoint to purchase with Azoth Salt
{amount} to Checkpoint {index}
Can't unlock more of this item

Azoth Salt is the currency that gets you rewards from the PvP Track. You can gain Azoth Salt by engaging in War, Outpost Rush, 3v3 Arenas, PvP Missions, PvP open world kills, and earning XP while flagged.\n\nAzoth Salt balance is capped at 100,000.

Azoth Salt is the currency that gets you rewards from the PvP Track. You can gain Azoth Salt by engaging in War, Outpost Rush, 3v3 Arenas, PvP Missions, PvP open world kills, and earning XP while flagged.\n\nAzoth Salt is not awarded when killing players 10+ levels below your current level and the victim also needs to have been flagged for longer than 10 minutes.

The PvP Reward Track contains PvP-specific rewards for doing PvP activities in the game. The track can be completed and run again to get a different selection of rewards, with more prestigious rewards becoming available as more tracks are completed.
Progress your track by engaging in PvP Missions, War, Outpost Rush, Capturing Forts, Defeating other players and 3v3 Arenas.

Azoth Salt is the currency that gets you rewards from the PvP Track. You can gain Azoth Salt by engaging in War, Outpost Rush, 3v3 Arenas, PvP Missions, PvP open world kills, and earning XP while flagged.
Choose between unique rewards such as prestige armor and weapons, emotes, currencies, and consumables.
Receive a bonus for each Checkpoint that has an unclaimed reward, and carry your Azoth Salt over to a new track with new rewards.
Track Completion Bonus: {amount}

string.comment: Period such as Month, Week, Season

resources.string: Craft Potions, Tinctures, and Magical Items.
Craft melee weapons and heavy armors here.
Craft ranged weapons and house furnishings.

string.comment: wilderness survival is not a trainable skill and is always equal to the character's level, so just tell users it's their character level for simplicity

resources.string: You cannot dye items while at war.
You cannot dye items while in Outpost Rush.
YOU CANNOT PLACE A CAMP WHILE AT WAR

%s has encountered a fatal error. We're sorry for the inconvenience.

A crash debugging file has been created at:
%s

If you are willing to submit this file to Amazon it will help us improve the New World experience. We will treat this report as confidential.

Would you like to send the error report?
Continue to ask for future crashes?\n\nIf NO, we will never send future crashes by default (nor continue to ask).
Continue to ask for future crashes?\n\nIf NO, we will continue to send future crashes without asking.

<font color="#aeab9d"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">Character Limit per Region</font></font>\n\nYou have <font color="#ffffff">{numCharacter}</font> characters in this region. The maximum is {maxCharacter}.

string.comment: US means United States
US means United States
EU means European Union
AP means Asian Pacific
SA means South America

resources.string: Character slot is locked. Slot is unavailable, purchase character slot to unlock this character
You cannot select a world while it is in maintenance.
Error loading game assets! Please check your installation.

Your free session has ended due to a queue of players waiting to enter this world. Please requeue to rejoin the world. Paid players have priority in the queue over free players.\n\nSign up for the New World Newsletter to get the latest news and offers from Aeternum.
Thank you for joining us during New World's Free Weekend!\n\nSign up for the New World Newsletter to get the latest news and offers from Aeternum.
